One of the best FPS shooters on the market and currently in the world. There are multiple game modes ranging from casual play to intense & serious competitive games. Great way to get started into the world of FPS shooters- especially if you're looking to be a serious competitive player. Would recommend buying asap!

It's a very good game, but I really dislike the anti-cheat. I understand it's supposed to prevent cheaters but I got VAC banned and didn't even cheat at all, I was using an addon to save replays in-game. Steam Support wouldn't even do anything about it.
